text: [Music]
Hi, everybody!
Today I'm going to make Kimchi pancakes.
I'm going to show you two kinds of Kimchi pancakes.
First one is that I use chopped Kimchi.
Second one is my grandmother's recipe, late grandmother.
She's using whole Kimchi leaves.
So okay. Let's start. I made this Kimchi around one month ago.
It's really sour and so delicious now.
Just cut it, this part
Maybe this amount
Chop chop chop chop~
1 cup, [for] we are going to make the large size of Kimchi pancake
Then this leftover Kimchi. I'm going to just put it back
2 tbsp chopped onion, 3 tbsp Kimchi juice
1/4 cup water
1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour
1/2 teaspoon sugar. A little bit of sugar make it really tasty. Mix it well.
So lots of Kimchi with a little batter right?
Heat up your pan.
Around 2 tbsp, so I'm using grapeseed oil now
Okay, flipping time!
[Music]
See? Wow~ Looks good!
Press it like this.
And then cook evenly. I lower the heat a little bit.
One and a half minutes later, so we are going to...
Do you think we need one more flip?
Okay, good.
You can see that both side is crispy.
Look, it's done.
So we need to cool down
Transfer this (to) your serving plate
One left. I'm going to eat it ^^
[Mmm]
Delicious.
You need some garnish, so I'll use this.
So chop it up
Next, another type of Kimchi pancake. Using this, just the whole leaf.
Kimchi leaf
One, two, three, four, five, six.
2 tbsp ground pork
Chives, maybe 1 teaspoon.
And this is around 1 tbsp chopped onion
And little bit salt,
1/4 teaspoon salt.
And black pepper,
Sesame oil! A little bit, little bit~
So I'll use this one egg for this and pinch of salt.
Mix this.
This is 1/2 cup of flour
Okay
Put some of the mixture over this meat and tofu let's make the spread this way
And a little bit of (flour)
Heat up a pan
Medium heat. Put some oil, meat part should go to the bottom.
Cook a few minutes until the meat is cooked thoroughly.
Okay, now is time to turn over
It doesn't look like a Kimchi, right?
One more time. Oh it kind of
Okay, this way
Pour some grapeseed oil
When you serve, you can cut it or you can just serve in pieces
Little sweet and little sour
So we learned two kinds of Kimchi pancakes. First one very basic Kimchi pancake, using chopped Kimchi
Second one is just using whole leaf but inside we have some mixture of meat and tofu.
Enjoy my recipe! See you next time, bye bye!
